mapper.insert: insert into Custom_goods_order(orderno, gno , userid , email,phone,model_name,casename,price,custom_image,custom_content,quantity,totalprice,payment,order_request,delivery_request,delivery_address, orderpw ) values(#{orderno},#{gno},#{userid},#{email},#{phone},#{model_name},#{casename},#{price},#{custom_image},#{custom_content},#{quantity},#{totalprice},#{payment},#{order_request},#{delivery_request},#{delivery_address},#{orderpw})
